## Blueberry muffins `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

296ml milk \
1tsp [apple cider vinegar](#sec-other) \
250g P flour \
200g sugar \
2tsp BP \
1/4tsp salt \
1tbs cornflour \
79g melted butter \
1tsp vanilla \
222g blueberries

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

200° \
20-25mins \
12 muffins

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Make buttermilk.
1. [Muffin method](#sec-muffin-method).

![](pictures/blueberry-muffins-01.jpg)
